downloadTitle: System Center 2012 R2 Integration Pack for HP Operations Manager
downloadDescription: The Integration Pack for HP Operations Manager is an add-on for System Center 2012 R2 Orchestrator that enables you to create activities within runbooks that make requests to the HP Operations Manager product to get data or perform functions.
detailsSection:
The Integration Pack for HP Operations Manager is an add-on for System Center 2012 R2 Orchestrator that enables you to create activities within runbooks that make requests to the HP Operations Manager product to get data or perform functions.

Feature Summary
This integration pack adds the HP Operations Manager category to the Activity pane in the Runbook Designer. This category contains the following activities:
  • Acknowledge Message
  • Add Annotation
  • Create Message
  • Delete Annotation
  • Delete Custom Attribute
  • Get Annotation
  • Get Message
  • Launch Tool
  • Monitor Message
  • Own/Disown Message
  • Set Custom Attribute
  • Update Annotation
  • Update Message

Release History
  • 06/27/2016 - Update 1 (version 7.2.81.0) - Included fixes to allow conversion of this Integration Pack to PowerShell module via System Center Orchestrator Migration Toolkit. The generated PowerShell modules can be used with Azure Automation or Service Management Automation.

  • 10/29/2013 - Original English release, version 7.2.48.0 .
systemRequirementsSection:
Other Software: System Center 2012 R2 - Orchestrator
    • RAM – minimum 1GB recommended 2GB
    • Disk space minimum 200MB
    • CPU Dual Core or better
    • .Net 3.5
installInstructionSection:
Download the package and extract the files to your computer by running the .exe.
Then follow the instruction on this page to install Integration Packs: http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh420346.aspx
